content:
Hi Team

I have implemented docker for ecrNow App and I am able to call systemLaunch Successfully but It has been noticed that scheduler not working in docker as well as not able to generate eicr report, but without docker it's working fine. Please see the logs ecrNow.log for your reference and let me know if anything missing.

Thanking you

Thanks & Regards
